item.title: Home 2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Keep in touch
with your child
anytime check_circle GPS Real Time Tracking & Child Locator check_circle Phone under “parental control” check_circle Fast and reliable 4G LTE Technology More Details Shop now What They Can Do

Watch tracker for kids

Location

Smartic gives information about the location of your child every minute with preciseness when outside up to 10 meters.

Calls

Smartic can receive and make calls only from/to numbers which are authorized by the parents.

Secure Zones

If your child leaves or enters these zones, you will immediately receive information.

Activity

The application allows you to monitor statistics of the activity of your child

Messages

Through the mobile application you can exchange voice with and send text messages to the watch.

SOS mode

In case you child needs you, they can press the SOS button.

Features

Safely connects families

Smartic was founded with the mission to give children a safe onboarding to digital life and a better balance between screen time and physical activity.
  • Watch Video

Designed for reliable mobile coverage

Smartic requires a Nano SIM card with voice calls, SMS and approximately 200MB data per month.For optimal coverage, we recommending connecting Smatic to a 3G network that uses 2100/850 MHz frequencies. More Details

Communicate the way you like

If it is inconvenient to call, voice chat is always available. It allows you to send voice messages for them to be listened and replied to in a convenient manner. More Details Download The App

Control easily from your smartphone

Reviews

What customers say

A great watch with lots of great features. Easy to make phone calls and send text messages. Also, makes it easy to keep track of where your child is with its location settings. Tracey L., New York I'm good to go. You won't regret it. Not able to tell you how happy I am with kid smartwatch. I have gotten at least 50 times the value from kid smartwatch. Fox X., New York Thanks to kid smartwatch, we've just launched our 5th website! I couldn't have asked for more than this. Kid smartwatch is the most valuable business resource we have EVER purchased. Etienne B., New York I have gotten at least 50 times the value from kid smartwatch. I just can't get enough of kid smartwatch. I want to get a T-Shirt with kid smartwatch on it so I can show it off to everyone. Javier U, New York

Fast & international
delivery

15 day for a free
return

Personal customer
support

Our Products

Which version is right for you

  • Incredible Marble Computer

    Rated 4.25 out of 5 $965,73 Add to cart

  • Fantastic Marble Coat

    Rated 4.75 out of 5 $458,61 Add to cart

  • Incredible Plastic Coat

    Rated 4.25 out of 5 $187,13 Add to cart

Sign up for updates & promotions
